text: I'm excited to announce the release of
our latest Lang chain Academy course
introduction to Lang Smith at Lang chain
we aim to make it as easy as possible to
build llm applications as we've worked
alongside developers we've seen that one
of the biggest challenges when building
LM applications is quality and
specifically it's understanding how your
LM app will perform in different
scenarios and why that's where Lang
Smith comes in it's a powerful platform
we've developed to help you build test
and monitor your llm application Lang
Smith equips you with the tools to
understand your application Behavior at
every stage of
development whether you're using a lang
chain framework or not Langs Smith has
you covered and it's free to get started
in this course we'll take you step by
step through using lsmith to get the
most out of the platform we'll build a
basic rag application and use Langs
Smith's prompt engineering tools to
iterate quickly we'll test the app's
performance using best practices to
evaluate llm applications and finally
we'll observe how our app is doing in
production using lsmith observability by
the end you'll have the skills needed to
leverage lsmith for building more
reliable production ready llm
applications I'm excited for you to take
this course and hope lsmith can support
you in your development Journey from
prototype to production
[Music]
